yy.text:
Configuration for https://turbowarp.org/
You can move, resize, and minimize this comment, but don't edit it by hand. This comment can be deleted to remove the stored settings.
{"framerate":60,"runtimeOptions":{"maxClones":Infinity,"miscLimits":false,"fencing":false},"width":1024,"height":768} // _twconfig_

yA.text: stop scripts and move on to game

po.text:

Toy Bonnie
Toy Chica
Mangle
Balloon Boy
Marionette
Withered Freddy
Withered Bonnie
Withered Chica
Foxy

in order of:
Freddy
Bonnie
Chica
Foxy

t,.text: Sprite checks if it's a clone or not

t=.text: Sprite checks if it's a clone or not

w?.text: Prevent Chica from going to a cam occupied by Bonnie or Freddy

vj.text: Prevent Bonnie from going to a cam occupied by Chica

xu.text: Prevent Freddy from going to a cam occupied by Chica

y).text: I will put animatronic AI here
